stepTitle: The average velocity of the ball over the time interval: $$[4.99, 5]$$ is $$-48.951$$. The average velocity of the ball over the time interval: [5, $$5.01]$$ is $$-49.049$$. The average velocity of the ball over the time interval: $$[4.999, 5]$$ is $$-48.9951$$. The average velocity of the ball over the time interval: [5, $$5.001]$$ is $$-49.0049$$. Use these to guess the instantaneous velocity of the ball at $$t=5$$ sec. Write in the form of an integer.
